short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you to solve PRs faster.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The tool will provide a little box inside Github PRs.
Inside the box you can mark PR files as viewed/unviewed by a regex pattern.
Also you can remove viewed, moved and deleted files from the DOM, so your browser is more responsive within large PRs.
